entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.6°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with rain beginning in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with rain in the evening. Blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
